verses.verse: <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G3767>then<s%> be <S%G4891>risen<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which are <S%G507>above,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2521>sits<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For you are <S%G599>dead,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> is <S%G2928>hid<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who is our <S%G2222>life,<s%> shall <S%G5319>appear,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5319>appear<s%> with him in <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

<S%G3499>Mortify<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are on the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> <S%G3806>inordinate<s%> <S%G3806>affection,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1939>concupiscence,<s%> and <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G1495>idolatry:<s%>
For <S%G3739>which<s%> things' sake the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience:<s%>
In the <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G4218>some<s%> <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> you <S%G2198>lived<s%> in them.

But <S%G3570>now<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G659>put<s%> <S%G659>off<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these; <S%G3709>anger,<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G2549>malice,<s%> <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> <S%G148>filthy<s%> <S%G148>communication<s%> out of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>
<S%G5574>Lie<s%> not <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> seeing that you have <S%G554>put<s%> <S%G554>off<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> with his <S%G4234>deeds;<s%>

And have <S%G1746>put<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G3501>new<s%> man, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G341>renewed<s%> in <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of him that <S%G2936>created<s%> him:

<S%G3699>Where<s%> there is <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G1672>Greek<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision,<s%> <S%G915>Barbarian,<s%> <S%G4658>Scythian,<s%> <S%G1401>bond<s%> nor <S%G1658>free:<s%> but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G3956>all,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G430>Forbearing<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3437>quarrel<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G5100>any:<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> forgave you, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> do you.
And <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5125>these<s%> things put on <S%G26>charity,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G5047>perfection.<s%>

And let the <S%G1515>peace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1018>rule<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> to the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> you are <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body;<s%> and be you <S%G2170>thankful.<s%>

Let the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1774>dwell<s%> in you <S%G4146>richly<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom;<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> and <S%G3560>admonishing<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms<s%> and <S%G5215>hymns<s%> and <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> with <S%G5485>grace<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

And <S%G3956>whatever<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> in <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> by him.
<S%G1135>Wives,<s%> <S%G5293>submit<s%> yourselves to <S%G2398>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> as it is <S%G433>fit<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G435>Husbands,<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G1135>wives,<s%> and be not <S%G4087>bitter<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> them.
<S%G5043>Children,<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things: for <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G2101>well<s%> pleasing to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G3962>Fathers,<s%> <S%G2042>provoke<s%> not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> to anger, <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they be <S%G120>discouraged.<s%>

<S%G1401>Servants,<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> not with <S%G3787>eye-service,<s%> as men <S%G441>pleasers;<s%> but in <S%G572>singleness<s%> of <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>
And <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G3748><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2038>do<s%> it <S%G1537>heartily,<s%> <S%G5590><s%> as to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and not to <S%G444>men;<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> you shall <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G469>reward<s%> of the <S%G2817>inheritance:<s%> for you <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
